name: OrderAction
comment: Contains the list of operations that can be performed on a product or service. For example,  provide a new product or change a product that is already assigned to a customer.
vf short description: Contains the list of operations that can be performed on a product or service. For example,  provide a new product or change a product that is already assigned to a customer.

fields.name: OrderActionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: OrderActionKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the order action in ALDM. Each order action key value represents a unique order action.

fields.name: OrderActionCancellationReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: OrderConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: OrderStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status changed.

fields.name: OrderConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: OrderSalesChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: OrderActionConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: OrderActionTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which an order action was created.

fields.name: OrderActionCommittedDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the order action achieved the committed milestone.

fields.name: OrderActionCompletedDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the order action achieved the committed milestone.

fields.name: MilestoneDoneFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the order action has passed the DONE milestone.

fields.name: OrderActionDoneDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the order action achieved the done milestone.

fields.name: ActionDueDate
fields.comment: Indicates the latest date for the order action to be delivered. The communication service provider is committed to deliver the order action by this date.

fields.name: ActionEarlyDate
fields.comment: Indicates the earliest date for the order action to be delivered. The order action must not be delivered before this date. If an early due date is not populated (NULL), the communication service provider delivers the request as soon as possible.

fields.name: FutureResumeDate
fields.comment: Indicates the future resume date of suspend order action.

fields.name: PriorityInd
fields.comment: Indicates the priority of the order action.

fields.name: InstalledAddressTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the installation addressFor example, official and partial.

fields.name: OfferReplaceOptionInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the offer must be replaced as a result of validity checks. Values are:- M = Mandatory- O = Optional- I = Ignore- N = No Issue- NA = Not Allowed

fields.name: ProductReplaceOptionInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the product must be replaced as a result of validity checks. Values are:- M = Mandatory- O = Optional- I = Ignore- N = No Issue- NA = Not Allowed

fields.name: MainOrderActionFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether an order action is the main order action.

fields.name: ActiveFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the order action is active.Values are:- 1 - Active- 0 - Inactive

fields.name: AddProductFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the Add Product to Offer option has been applied to the order action.

fields.name: ReplaceOfferFlag
fields.comment: Indicates any one of the following:- The order action was created during a Replace Offer operation, for example, Change Part of Replace Offer.- The order action belongs to a Replace Offer operation, for example, REDO, provided that the offer has been replaced.

fields.name: OrderActionId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the order action in the source system.

fields.name: ContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceRequestDate
fields.comment: Indicates the order action completion date requested by the customer.

fields.name: OrderActionStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status of the order action changed.

fields.name: OrderActionConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was created in the source system

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system

fields.name: CreatorEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionReasonNote
fields.comment: Indicates the description of the reason given by the user for the order action.

fields.name: ReferenceNumber
fields.comment: Indicates the reference number given to the customer for an order action.

fields.name: WorkOrderId
fields.comment: Identifies the work order that is related to the order action.

fields.name: OssMessageDesc
fields.comment: Indicates the OSS message for an order action.

fields.name: OssMessageExpirationDate
fields.comment: Specifies the expiration date of the OSS fulfillment message.

fields.name: OssMessageReceivedDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time the OSS message was received.

fields.name: OrderActionParentRelationInd
fields.comment: Specifies the relation between the order action and its parent order action. This is applicable only for nested order actions.

fields.name: ParentOrderActionId
fields.comment: Indicates the parent order action that contains an order action. The reference would be an ID of the order action.

fields.name: ProvisioningDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which an order action received from an external system was provisioned.

fields.name: ParentOrderActionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CeasePartOfMoveServiceRequiredDate
fields.comment: Indicates the service required date of the Cease Part of Move.

fields.name: BusinessProductTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the business product type for the order action.

fields.name: DealerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: DeliveryMethodSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSiteSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
